ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No indeed, you will soon know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But you will come to know soon; --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay, you will soon come to know;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Yes certainly, you will soon realise!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! You shall come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; but soon you shall know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but ye will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But you will soon come to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: No indeed, soon you will know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But nay, ye soon shall know (the reality).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! You shall come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But no, indeed, you shall soon know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No! You are going to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [102:3] No indeed! — a disavowal. You will come to know!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay) this is a reply and threat to them, (but ye will come to know) what will be done to you in the graves!
